The term Hacker designates a set of Troopers who have received specific training in Infowar. This training allows them to make use of Hacking Devices, and the programs specifically designed for them.

{{css_skillbox |black| HACKER | AUTOMATIC SKILL }}
{{skill-label | Obligatory }}
{{effects}}
* Hackers may be equipped with a [[Hacking Device]] that will grant them access to certain [[Hacking Program]]s, depending on the type of Device they are using, or to make direct use of certain Programs without requiring a device.
* Hackers may have [[Quantronic_Combat_(Hacking)#Upgrade_Programs_.28UPGRADE.29 | Upgrade Programs]] assigned to them.
* This Special Skill remains active even when its owner is in a [[Null]] State.
{{css_skillbox-end}}
